title: Brisbane Based League of Legends tournament
body:
Duckyy's Gaming Lounge is hosting its first Tournament, Brisbane get your teams together and save the date!

Sorry for the Copy/Paste but didn't want to miss anything, all the information below was taken from event page on Facebook!

**Team Signup**
https://www.duckyysgaminglounge.com.au/tournament-signup

**Solo Signup - will be placed into a team if possible**
https://www.duckyysgaminglounge.com.au/solo-signups

**Minimum of 8 Teams Required **

**Single round elimination with Best of 3 for Finals!**

Entry Fee $30 Per Person $150 Per Team (Subs not inc)

**First Place Prize**
Cash Prize - $600 (divided $120 Per Player)
Two 6 Hour training sessions in one of our VIP/Competition Rooms
1,600 RP Each + Triumphant Ryze Skin + 4 Win ip Boost
(Event Supported by Corsair!) Each member of winning team (x5)
Corsair K70 Cherry MX Blue Switch Mechanical Keyboard!!

**Second Place Prize**
Cash Prize - $300 (divided $60 Per Player)
One 6 Hour training session in one of our VIP/Competition Rooms
1,200 RP Each + 4 Win IP Boost

In house Tournament - Must be in store to compete - 

Will be streamed on Twitch & Youtube! 
https://www.twitch.tv/duckyysgaminglounge
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCN3UdZqywLINMSaj8J8tENA (Custom URL Coming Soon)

Keep an eye on this event for updates!



Each team must assign a Captain who will talk to Admins on behalf of their team, this will make communication between ourselves and the teams a lot easier.

Entry fee will be required 1 week before the event begins, this will give us enough time to get replacement teams if needed 
(once we hit 8 teams we will create a waiting list)

We will contact team Captains with best payment method, team Captains will need to sort each teams fees and submit them as a team, no individual payments will be accepted.

To Register get the Captian of the Team to message Duckyy's Gaming Lounge on Facebook and we will add you to the list!

Any questions about the event just send us a message and we will get back to you ASAP!

-Duckyy

replies.body: awesome to see some Brisbane tournaments happening! Nice work guys :)
